item.title: Deploying and accessing a GCP SQL database via Kubernetes
item.description: Sorry for the long preamble, feel free to just skip straight to the technical details. Two years ago, faced with the challenge of wanting to reduce the tooling required to deploy infrastructure to Google Cloud I started working on a Google Cloud Operator. The goal of this project was to be able to stand up networks, images, and Virtual Machines for installing Pivotal’s PKS (now Tanzu Kubernetes Grid Integrated).
